ticket.title: Add :error to redirect_to (there is already :notice, :alert, and :flash)
ticket.original-body:
Currently, redirect_to accepts :notice, :alert, and :flash.
Why not accept usual :error ?
It is of course possible with redirect_to url, flash => { :error => "error" }
But that is a bit long and not consistent with notice and alert.
Thoughts?
